titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to award a grant for the establishment of the National Center for Sickle Cell Disease Research, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S16477-16478)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Labor and Human Resources

action.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources. Hearings held.

bill.summary: 11/19/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to award a grant to the Louisiana Department of Health and Hospitals to establish and construct the National Center for Sickle Cell Disease Research at Southern University in Baton Rouge, Louisiana, and for related facilities and equipment at such Center. Authorizes appropriations.
